organization.$: School of Packaging and Material Engineering

head.citation-title: A hologram algorithm based on DWT-QDFT for hardcopy color image
head.abstracts: Â© 2016, Science Press in China. All right reserved.In order to improve the robustness of the holographic watermarking algorithm in discrete wavelet domain, we propose a robust hologram watermarking scheme based on discrete wavelet transform (DWT) and quaternion discrete Fourier transform (QDFT), which can be used in hardcopy color image. Firstly, for getting a robustness embed area, we conducted DWT on the three color components of the host color image and got their low frequency coefficients to construct a pure quaternion matrix. Then the middle frequency region of the real part of QDFT coefficient was replaced by holographic watermark information. By inverse QDFT and wavelet reconstruction, we finally got the watermarked color image. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed algorithm achieves good performance in robustness against both common signal operations and print-and-scan attack. Computer-generated holography technology and low frequency wavelet coefficient domain embedding manner provide a robustness guarantee. The quaternion used in processing color image makes the algorithm have good performance in invisibility even the low frequency information of the host image is modified, and provides a more covert embedding area combined with transform domain.

organization.$: School of Packaging and Material Engineering
